definitions.definition: A stray hair that is difficult to style.
Anything that is difficult to capture or restrain.
A kind of dismount from bars that incorporates one or more flips or twists.
Disposed to fly away; unrestrained; light and free.
Flighty; frivolous
(of hair) Soft, light, unruly, and difficult to set into a style.
In need; poor.
definitions.example: Needy people want to give too, but have few material goods to offer.

definitions.definition: Desiring constant affirmation; lacking self-confidence.
definitions.example: It's emotionally exhausting to be around her because she's so needy.

definitions.definition: Needful; necessary.
One motivated by gain, especially monetary.
A person employed to fight in an armed conflict who is not a member of the state or military group for which they are fighting and whose primary motivation is private gain.
One hired to engage in a figurative battle, as a corporate takeover, a lawsuit, or a political campaign.
Motivated by private gain.
A designated player that attempts to prevent the opposing team from scoring by protecting a goal.
A convex quadrilateral in which each pair of opposite edges are parallel and of equal length.

(Gaelic games) either of two rectangular areas (respectively the large parallelogram and the small parallelogram) abutting the goal line in front of the goal. (Since 1986 officially named the large rectangle and small rectangle, though the older names are still occasionally used.)
Any of several large North American hares of the genus Lepus
To make a sudden, rapid movement
To disappoint or defeat; to vex by depriving of something expected or desired.
definitions.example: It frustrates me to do all this work and then lose it all.

definitions.definition: To hinder or thwart.
definitions.example: My clumsy fingers frustrate my typing efforts.

definitions.definition: To cause stress or annoyance.
definitions.example: This test frustrates me because if I fail, it'll destroy my grade.

definitions.definition: Ineffectual; useless; fruitless.
To make smug, or spruce.
To seize; to confiscate.
To hush up.
Irritatingly pleased with oneself, offensively self-complacent, self-satisfied.
definitions.example: Kate looked extremely smug this morning.

definitions.definition: Studiously neat or nice, especially in dress; spruce; affectedly precise; smooth and prim.
Attractively thin; gracefully slender.
Refined, delicate.
To cause (something) to move rapidly in opposite directions alternatingly.
definitions.example: He shook the can of soda for thirty seconds before delivering it to me, so that, when I popped it open, soda went everywhere.

definitions.definition: To move (one's head) from side to side, especially to indicate refusal, reluctance or disapproval.
definitions.example: Shaking his head, he kept repeating "No, no, no".

definitions.definition: To move or remove by agitating; to throw off by a jolting or vibrating motion.
definitions.example: to shake fruit down from a tree

definitions.definition: To disturb emotionally; to shock.
definitions.example: He was shaken by what had happened.

definitions.definition: To lose, evade, or get rid of (something).
definitions.example: I can't shake the feeling that I forgot something.

definitions.definition: To move from side to side.
definitions.example: She shook with grief.

definitions.definition: (usually as "shake on") To shake hands.
definitions.example: OK, let's shake on it.

definitions.definition: To dance.
definitions.example: She was shaking it on the dance floor.

definitions.definition: To give a tremulous tone to; to trill.
definitions.example: to shake a note in music

definitions.definition: To threaten to overthrow.
definitions.example: The experience shook my religious belief.

definitions.definition: To be agitated; to lose firmness.
In a state of shock or trauma.
definitions.example: We were left shaken by the revelations of abuse.

definitions.definition: A person who officiates at a religious ceremony, especially a marriage or the Eucharist.
A person who conducts formal ceremonies in the community, particularly weddings, baby namings, renewals of wedding vows and funerals.
A person who is celebrating something.
A pool that is small in diameter, but deep, usually resulting from erosion by a natural force such as a waterfall or rapids.
Any of several simple cooked desserts made from sweetened milk and some starchy ingredient.
Being able to be driven, or suitable for driving, on the open road.
Something that is open to negotiation.
(of an obstacle, route etc) Able to be traversed; navigable.
Able to be transferred to another person, with or without endorsement, in exchange for money.
Open to negotiation or bargaining.
definitions.example: Salary is negotiable, according to education and experience.

definitions.definition: (chiefly US) (of an employer) To dismiss (workers) from employment, e.g. at a time of low business volume or through no fault of the worker, often with a severance package.
(of a bookmaker) To place all or part of a bet with another bookmaker in order to reduce risk.
To cease, quit, stop (doing something).
definitions.example: Lay off the singing, will you! I'm trying to study.

definitions.definition: To stop bothering, teasing, or pestering someone; to leave (someone) alone.
definitions.example: I told him to lay off me but he wouldn't stop.

definitions.definition: (artisanal terminology) In painting, to apply gentle strokes to smooth a wet coat of paint so as to remove visible roller- or brush-marks, commonly using a dry brush; a similar technique, but using a loaded laying-off brush, may produce a smooth coat of paint when using a roller or the usual brush techniques would leave marks.
definitions.example: He shows me how to lay off the paint — and moves his paintbrush across the section he had already painted, again and again.

definitions.definition: To plan out (a navigational course) using a chart.
A hollow six-pointed star formed by overlapping two equilateral triangles.
Any of the 64 sets of solid and broken lines, formed by pairs of trigrams, used for divination in the I Ching.
A large silver coin minted during the Byzantine Empire.
A long sled without runners, with the front end curled upwards, which may be pulled across snow by a cord or used to coast down hills.
A similar sled of wood, pulled by dogs, possibly with steel runners, made to transport cargo.
Something which, once it starts going (figuratively) downhill, is unstoppable until it reaches the bottom.
(especially South Carolina, West Virginia) A knit cap, designed to provide warmth in cold weather.
To slide down a hill on a toboggan or other object.
To go downhill unstoppably until one reaches the bottom.
Work done where the worker is hired and paid one day at a time, with no promise that more work will be available in the future.
The large, usually yellowish-green or black, pulpy fruit of the avocado tree.
The avocado tree, Persea americana, of the laurel family.
A dark chartreuse colour, like the colour of the skin of an avocado.
Of a dull yellowish-green colour.
One who achieves something.
One who tends to succeed; a winner.
To retell something real as if it were fiction, especially by fabricating falsehoods
To convert something into a novel or other dramatic work
A sauce, such as mayonnaise, used to flavour or season a salad.
A rebirth of a soul, in a physical life form, such as a body.
The philosophy of such a rebirth, a specific belief or doctrine on how such a rebirth occurs.
A fresh embodiment.
A new, considerably improved, version.
A police officer.
One who peels.
A device for peeling fruit or vegetables.
Something to be peeled.
Something that is peeling, about to peel, or prone to peeling.
An ideal wave.
A plant which impoverishes the soil by demanding high value nutrients and so requires the use of fertilizers.
Someone who breaks horses.
To give a reward to or for.
definitions.example: Why are you rewarding that bad behaviour?

definitions.definition: To recompense.
definitions.example: Decorations are meant to reward the most meritous acts and services.

definitions.definition: To give (something) as a reward.
Giving or resulting in reward or satisfaction.
A man who does small tasks and odd jobs
A very high rate of inflation.
An airspace in which aircraft, especially military aircraft, are forbidden to fly
The state or quality of being catholic or universal; catholicity.
Liberality of sentiment; breadth of view.
One of a group of nymphs who lured mariners to their death on the rocks.
One who sings sweetly and charms.
A dangerously seductive woman.
A member of an order of mammals of Sirenia (first attested in French in Dominique Bouhours, Les entretiens d'Ariste et d'Eugène, 1671).

A member of a genus of aquatic salamanders of the family Sirenidae (originally introduced by Linnaeus, 1766, for a genus of his reptiles), commonly used for all species subsumed under the family of Sirenidae.
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Hestina.
A device, either mechanical or electronic, that makes a piercingly loud sound as an alarm or signal, or the sound from such a device (first recorded 1879).
A musical instrument, one of the few aerophones in the percussion section of the symphony orchestra (patented as Acme Siren in 1895).
An instrument for demonstrating the laws of beats and combination tones.
An astrophysical event that can be used for calculating cosmic distances.
To make a noise with, or as if with, a siren.
Relating to or like a siren.
A non-commissioned soldier willing to serve any state or person who will hire him.
(by extension) A person willing to work for or ally himself with any person or institution who will take him on.
A pan for frying, generally large and heavy.
definitions.example: Heat some oil in a cast-iron skillet and add the onions.

definitions.definition: (sometimes attributive) A dish or meal cooked in such a pan.
definitions.example: Can you make up a quick skillet hash?

definitions.definition: To cook in a skillet.
The transmission of picture messages between mobile phones
A person or group of persons, often armed, responsible for protecting an individual.
To act as bodyguard for (someone); figuratively, to protect.
A pass that allows the user to travel on buses for a certain duration or a certain number of trips.

antonyms: in the year of our Lord

definitions.definition: Initialism of Before Christ.
Basso continuo
(law enforcement) bodycam
By or for the cause that; on this account that; for the reason that.
definitions.example: I hid myself because I was afraid.

definitions.definition: As is known, inferred, or determined from the fact that.
definitions.example: I don't think he is a nice person, because he yells at people for no reason.

definitions.definition: So that, in order that.
A type of grass (such as wheat, rice or oats) cultivated for its edible grains.
The grains of such a grass.
Breakfast cereal.
definitions.example: Which cereal would you like for breakfast?

definitions.definition: To go out, to set forth.
To go further; to exceed or surpass; go beyond.
To overtake; to travel faster than.
To outdo; exceed; surpass.
To come to an end.
The act of leaving or going out; exit, departure.
(chiefly in the plural) Money that leaves one's possession; expenditure, outlay, expense.
The extreme limit; the place of ending.
Extraverted: talkative, friendly, and social, especially with respect to meeting new people easily and comfortably.
definitions.example: Tom is very outgoing and enjoys meeting people; his brother, on the other hand, is painfully shy.

definitions.definition: Going out, on its way out.
definitions.example: Is there any outgoing post?

definitions.definition: Being replaced in office (while still in office but after election has determined that he/she will be replaced).
definitions.example: The outgoing politician wasn't too disappointed he'd lost the election; he was tired of political infighting.

definitions.definition: A structure made of scaffolding for workers to stand on while working on a building.
An elevated platform on which a criminal is executed.
An elevated platform on which dead bodies are ritually disposed of, as by some Native American tribes.
An accumulation of adherent, partly fused material forming a shelf or dome-shaped obstruction above the tuyeres in a blast furnace.
A structure that provides support for some other material.
To set up a scaffolding; to surround a building with scaffolding.
To sustain; to provide support for.
To dispose of the bodies of the dead on a scaffold or raised platform, as by some Native American tribes.
To apply a force to (an object) such that it moves away from the person or thing applying the force.
definitions.example: In his anger he pushed me against the wall and threatened me.

definitions.definition: To continually attempt to persuade (a person) into a particular course of action.
To press or urge forward; to drive.
definitions.example: to push an objection too far; to push one's luck

definitions.definition: To continually promote (a point of view, a product for sale, etc.).
definitions.example: Stop pushing the issue — I'm not interested.

definitions.definition: To continually exert oneself in order to achieve a goal.
To approach; to come close to.
definitions.example: He's pushing sixty. (= he's nearly sixty years old)

definitions.definition: To tense the muscles in the abdomen in order to expel its contents.
definitions.example: During childbirth, there are times when the obstetrician advises the woman not to push.

definitions.definition: To continue to attempt to persuade a person into a particular course of action.
To make a higher bid at an auction.
To make an all-in bet.
To move (a pawn) directly forward.
To add (a data item) to the top of a stack.
To publish (an update, etc.) by transmitting it to other computers.
To thrust the points of the horns against; to gore.
To burst out of its pot, as a bud or shoot.
To strike the cue ball in such a way that it stays in contact with the cue and object ball at the same time (a foul shot).
The green vegetable Brassica oleracea var. gemmifera, a cabbage variety native to Belgium.
definitions.example: Brussels sprouts reach a length of 4 centimeters and resemble clusters of miniature cabbages.

definitions.definition: To turn a switch to the "off" position in order to stop or disable a device.
To lose interest, and start thinking about something else.
To alternate between; to trade.
definitions.example: Do you eat all your peas and then all your potatoes, or do you switch off between them as you go?

definitions.definition: In the part of the score sheet in bridge that is reserved for honors, penalty, and premiums; a score that does not count towards game.
Classified as an ordinary expense or revenue item, or a current asset.
Having a broad reach rather than targeting a specific demographic.
The side of a right triangle opposite the right angle.
An instance of actions and/or schemes fabricated to mislead someone into believing a lie or inaccuracy.
Offal
To steal in small quantities, or articles of small value; to practise petty theft.
The act by which something is pilfered; a petty theft.

A sweet or savory but usually spicy condiment, originally from eastern India, made from a variety of fruits and/or vegetables, often containing significant amounts of fresh green or dried red chili peppers.
A style of Indo-Caribbean music from the West Indies, associated especially with Trinidad and Tobago.
(in triage) Those casualties whose wounds do not require them to be moved on a stretcher but that can walk to medical treatment.
A person who shows initiative and resourcefulness.

A mechanism (usually one operated by electricity, compressed air, a spring, or an explosive gas), attached to an internal-combustion engine, as on an automobile, and used as a means of starting the engine without cranking it by hand.
Something conceived in the mind; an idea, a thought.
The faculty of conceiving ideas; mental faculty; apprehension.
definitions.example: a man of quick conceit

definitions.definition: Quickness of apprehension; active imagination; lively fancy.
Opinion, (neutral) judgment.
Esteem, favourable opinion.
A novel or fanciful idea; a whim.
An ingenious expression or metaphorical idea, especially in extended form or used as a literary or rhetorical device.
Overly high self-esteem; vain pride; hubris.
Design; pattern.
To form an idea; to think.
To conceive.
A structure used to smoke food to preserve it and to add flavor.
A structure in which freshly harvested tobacco is cured or preserved by smoking.
To let in; admit.
To insert; inlay.
A body of water let into a coast, such as a bay, cove, fjord or estuary.
A passage that leads into a cavity.
A wooden cross used for crucifixions, as by the Romans.
An ornamental or symbolic sculptural representation of Christ on a cross, often worn as a pendant or displayed in a Christian church.
definitions.example: Plain crosses are preferred by Protestants, but crucifixes by Catholics.

definitions.definition: The iron cross, a position on the rings where the gymnast holds the rings straight out on either side of the body.
A large, dark cloud, usually a cumulonimbus, charged with electricity and producing thunder and lightning; a stormcloud
(by extension) Something menacing and brooding.
definitions.example: the ominous thunderclouds of war

definitions.definition: Fine black or dull brown particles of amorphous carbon and tar, produced by the incomplete combustion of coal, oil etc.
To cover or dress with soot.
definitions.example: to soot land

definitions.definition: A sum of money loaned or borrowed for a short period of time in order to cover expenses until new expected funds become available.
In a state between dry and wet; moderately wet; moist.
definitions.example: The lawn was still damp so we decided not to sit down.

definitions.definition: Despondent; dispirited, downcast.
Permitting the possession of alcoholic beverages, but not their sale.
Something that damps or checks:
Bread made from a basic recipe of flour, water, milk, and salt, but without yeast.
The open chamber (resonator) of a stringed musical instrument, which intensifies its tone.
Characterized by, or conducive to poor health
definitions.example: The villagers lived in unhealthy surroundings.

definitions.definition: Sick or ill
definitions.example: He was an unhealthy child.

definitions.definition: Tending to corrupt
definitions.example: He liked unhealthy reading material.

definitions.definition: Characterized by disturbed mental health
definitions.example: He had an unhealthy interest in fire.

definitions.definition: Commendation; praise.
(in the plural) Compliments; greetings.
To congratulate or reward.
definitions.example: The schoolboy was commended for raising the alarm about the burning building.

definitions.definition: To praise or acclaim.
To entrust or commit to the care of someone else.
To mention by way of courtesy, implying remembrance and goodwill.
To recommend.
To adorn; to set off.
The quality of being adaptable; a quality that renders adaptable.

Variability in respect to, or under the influence of, external conditions; susceptibility of an organism to that variation whereby it becomes suited to or fitted for its conditions of environment; the capacity of an organism to be modified by circumstances.
One who, or that which, propels.
A mechanical device with evenly-shaped blades that turn on a shaft to push against air or water, especially one used to propel an aircraft or boat.
A steamboat thus propelled; a screw steamer.
A spinnerbait.
A member of the crew of a merchant ship who performs manual labour.
To work on a boat as a deckhand; crew.
In a perilous manner.
Any of several species of songbirds of the family Turdidae, often with spotted underbellies such as the bluebird, nightingale, and American robin have.
A female singer.
A fungal infection caused by Candida, now especially of the vagina; candidiasis.
A woman who does or can play the lead role in a movie, play or other production; a woman who frequently plays such roles.
The type of conventionally beautiful and approachable woman who is perceived as being capable of playing female lead roles in movies or other productions.
A roadside restaurant in India or Pakistan.
(by extension) Any restaurant that serves Punjabi food.
The hobby of collecting and displaying postage stamps and related items.
(usually derogatory) Collection of items or information of no intrinsic value.
To be unable to breathe because of obstruction of the windpipe (for instance food or other objects that go down the wrong way, or fumes or particles in the air that cause the throat to constrict).
definitions.example: Ever since he choked on a bone, he has refused to eat fish.

definitions.definition: To prevent (someone) from breathing or talking by strangling or filling the windpipe.
definitions.example: The collar of this shirt is too tight; it’s choking me.

definitions.definition: To obstruct (a passage, etc.) by filling it up or clogging it.
definitions.example: to choke a cave passage with boulders and mud

definitions.definition: To hinder or check, as growth, expansion, progress, etc.; to kill (a plant by robbing it of nutrients); to extinguish (fire by robbing it of oxygen).
To perform badly at a crucial stage of a competition because one is nervous, especially when one is winning.
definitions.example: He has a lot of talent, but he tends to choke under pressure.

definitions.definition: To move one's fingers very close to the tip of a pencil, brush or other art tool.
To be checked or stopped, as if by choking
To check or stop (an utterance or voice) as if by choking.
To have a feeling of strangulation in one's throat as a result of passion or strong emotion.
To give (someone) a feeling of strangulation as a result of passion or strong emotion.
To say (something) with one’s throat constricted (due to emotion, for example).
To use the choke valve of (a vehicle) to adjust the air/fuel mixture in the engine.
(of a duct) To reach a condition of maximum flowrate, due to the flow at the narrowest point of the duct becoming sonic (Ma = 1).
To make a choke, as in a cartridge, or in the bore of the barrel of a shotgun.
Having been unable to breathe due to airway obstruction (choking) or strangulation, but usually to the point of pain and discomfort without death.
Blocked or obstructed by thick material, often plant growth.
A shared record of past transactions in a cryptocurrency network.
Of the highest rank, or peak of excellence
In the highest division
Liqueur whose flavor is that of cocoa, and, often, slightly that of vanilla.
A short note serving as a reminder.
A written business communication.
A brief diplomatic communication.
A page in an annual publication honoring the memory of a person who died during the past year.
A lane or route at sea that is regularly used by ships; a sea lane or trade route
An inland waterway used by seagoing shipping
The headway of a vessel
To bring into contact with a substance that causes illness (a pathogen).
definitions.example: Not everyone will be infected when an epidemic strikes.

definitions.definition: To make somebody enthusiastic about one's own passion.
definitions.example: Her passion for dancing has infected me.

definitions.definition: Having an infection.
definitions.example: The infected bodies were hastily piled up and burned.

definitions.definition: A sentry, watch, or guard.
A private soldier.
A unique string of characters recognised by a computer program for processing in a special way; a keyword.
definitions.example: The  tag is a sentinel that suspends web-page processing and displays the subsequent text literally.

definitions.definition: A sentinel crab.
A sign of a health risk (e.g. a disease, an adverse effect).
definitions.example: sentinel animals can be used to explore endemic diseases.

definitions.definition: To watch over as a guard.
definitions.example: He sentineled the north wall.

definitions.definition: To post as guard.
definitions.example: He sentineled him on the north wall.

definitions.definition: To post a guard for.
definitions.example: He sentineled the north wall with just one man.

definitions.definition: Money used to set up a new business venture.
In a triumphant manner.
